  • Group Settings
  • Advanced Settings

Advanced Settings

Post Booster

Make it easier or more difficult for a group member's popular post to be sent automatically to the entire group.

  • Easy
  • Recommended
  • Hard

Post Expiration

Change the ampunt of time that group members have to engage with your posts or posts from members.

  • Low
  • Recommended
  • High

Post Limits

Limit or increase the number of posts that group members can make in any given month.

Request Permissions

Ask permission from users to access their data when they join your group. As group manager, only you will be able to see this information in the membership directory.


Treat your members' data with respect for their privacy and don't ask for more information than you need. Check our privacy policy here.

As a premium user, you can change these settings at any time. Upgrade Now
